Description: Vintage 1960 Hofner Senator Blonde Natural Electric Guitar 4.4lbs w/ OHSC CaseBeautiful 1960 Senator in a lovely blonde finish. Beautiful German goodness in exceptional condition. We have acquired this, along with a few other Hofners, from a guy who looked after all his guitars with great pride! The original finish has very little crazing, unlike most of this age, and has only a few small blemishes. Just check how nice the flame on the back is! The neck is extremely sturdy and holds true due to a previous neck reset. There also seems to be a small filled hole next to the neck join, as you can see. We cannot see anything that has been changed on this, including the tortoise shell pickguard. The original hard case is in brilliant condition, but the guitar sits slightly shy on each side. We'll make sure to fill it out for shipping.Weight: 4.4lbsSerial: 9368Please have a close look at the high resolution photographs below, as these form part of our description.Please note, for all you musicians and collectors outside of Europe, this guitar will need a CITES certificate to accompany the export of this guitar, due to inclusion of the restricted rosewood material. This application process can only be started once purchased, costs £59 (included in the postage price), and can add on up to 15 days to the posting off process. Please get in touch for more information before purchasing.At The Music Locker we will do all we can for you to get the instrument you want. You're more than welcome to come along and have a play on this through one of our vintage amplifiers!
Title: Vintage 1960 Hofner Senator Blonde Natural Electric Guitar 4.4lbs w/ OHSC Case
ConditionDescription: Any defects will be stated in the description.
